    • UIOverlay

      public UIOverlay(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage uiStage, PiazzaPanicGame game)
      Constructs a new UIOverlay for purposes of showing every section of the main game screen.
      Parameters:
      uiStage - The stage for actors to be added on to.
      game - The game to set the UIOverlay game to.
